channel.title: Need most PHSR's and other stuff
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Need most PHSR's and other stuff" - i have a bunch of glowing goo/superpots, silver elixirs, MOME etc. looking for phsr's, any kaiju drops, runes etc.

item.title: Need most PHSR's and other stuff
item.content:encoded:

i might trade for smoke bombs or pretty much anything else you offer. post or pm me here or pm me in game at Vampirate. thanks
